A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This new series\, and Last Jedi in particular\, are giving Star Wars fans that grew up with Episodes I II and III the same feeling that those films did to original fanatics. The most notable grain of salt is that these films are are partially a continuation\, but also a necessary attempt for Disney to indoctrinate a brand new generation into the Star Wars universe. While this movie will give fans of previous films a somewhat baffled or frustrated feeling of the changes going on in a galaxy far far away\, it is at the end\, very satisfying.
